name: Donald G. WILLIAMS, Vernon R. Shields, and Thomas S. Goas, Jr., Appellants, v. The STATE BOARD OF EXAMINERS OF ARCHITECTS
name_abbreviation: Williams v. State Board of Examiners of Architects

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Donald G. WILLIAMS, Vernon R. Shields, and Thomas S. Goas, Jr., Appellants, v. The STATE BOARD OF EXAMINERS OF ARCHITECTS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ronald M. Katzman, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Debra K. Wallet, Camp Hill, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 602
Donald G. WILLIAMS, Vernon R. Shields, and Thomas S. Goas, Jr., Appellants, v. The STATE BOARD OF EXAMINERS OF ARCHITECTS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 18, 1982.
Decided June 17, 1982.
Ronald M. Katzman, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Debra K. Wallet, Camp Hill, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
